headline: Getting Fired Was Best Thing to Happen to Me, Bobbi Brown Says
summary: World-renowned celebrity makeup artist Bobbi Brown talks about what it felt like being fired from Estée Lauder and how she reinvented herself in her 60s by launching Jones Road Beauty from scratch. She's on this week's episode of "The David Rubenstein Show: Peer to Peer Conversations." This interview was recorded December 15 in Montclair, New Jersey.
